Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1978...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 3/2/1981 (Going to LA: C G. Carter. Going to PIT: SS C. Ripken Jr., P S. Howe, CF J. Eisenreich)...
Injured on 8/8/1982 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/5/1983, off Gorman Heimueller (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1983, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 8/18/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1984, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 8/9/1985...
